movies.title: Ruby
movies.plot: Fact and fiction are combined in this story about Jack Ruby and a stripper, Candy Cane, and how they become involved in a conspiracy to kill J.F.K.

events.title: Jack Ruby kills Lee Harvey Oswald
Jack Ruby is sentenced to death
Jack Ruby dies of a blood clot

movies.title: Sleepers
movies.plot: Two gangsters seek revenge on the state jail worker who during their stay at a youth prison sexually abused them. A sensational court hearing takes place to charge him for the crimes.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

events.title: "John Reilly's bloated body was found face up in a tenement building"
"Thomas Marcano... was shot at close range five times"
